name: Lonely Kids Around the Cul-de-sac
description:
Length: 10-15 minutes.

Headphones are strongly recommended.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description

The game is basically kind of a visual novel where you play as a kid trick-or-treating with his friend a Halloween night.

Gameplay consists merely of selecting which houses to go to, reading dialogue and occasionally making some choices. All of this with your mouse.

Theme

This game was made for the Spooktober Jam 2021.

The theme was "Sacrifice".

To find out how it plays into the story of the game, I'm afraid you must get to the ending.

Credits

Writing and coding by Jerry Becerril.

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com.
